However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Penetrating_Ray_Quick.display_help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This causes Extreme Energy damage and may knock the target off their feet. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will also suffer additional damage over time. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect will cause this effect to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
Penetrating_Ray_Quick.display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme Dmg(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

Penetrating_Ray_Normal.display_help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow

Kinetic_Lance_Quick.display_help: You form the potential energies around you into a lance of energy that you fire at a single target. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Contaminated_Strike_Contamination.display_help: You charge your fist with harmful radioactive particles and quickly strike your foe dealing Light Energy and Smashing damage as well as reducing their defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Contaminated_Strike_Contamination.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Contaminated Strike!

X-Ray_Beam_Contamination.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam_Contamination.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Radiation_Siphon_Contamination.display_help: You pummel your foe with a deadly smashing attack dealing High Energy and Smashing damage and reducing their defense. Hitting Contaminated targets will also heal you for a large amount of health over 3 seconds and remove the Contaminated effect from the target. However, uncontaminated targets have a moderate chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: High Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Radiation_Siphon_Contamination.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Radiation Siphon!

Devastating_Blow_Contamination.display_help: You hammer your foe with a brutal smashing attack charged with a lethal dose of radiation. Your target will suffer Extreme Energy and Smashing damage, will have its defense reduced and will be disoriented for a short time. Devastating Blow has an increased change to critically hit. Affected enemies will be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Devastating_Blow_Contamination.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special

Proton_Volley_Quick_Contamination.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Volley_Quick_Contamination.display_target_help: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Proton_Volley_Normal_Contamination.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Volley_Normal_Contamination.display_target_help: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Assassins_Blades_Stealth.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous lethal damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. This power is needed for the Empower and Sweep combination attacks. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Assassins_Impaler_Stealth.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow
